pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Revice (2021, TV show)$(br2)Used to access Revi's $(l:revice/riders/revi#volcano_rex)Volcano Rex Genome$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Vice's $(l:revice/riders/vice#volcano_rex)Volcano Rex Genome$(/l)

Obtained by using $(l:revice/items/proto_vistamp)Blank Vistamps$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/vistamp_bar)Vistamp Bar$(/l) while having the $(l:revice/items/barid_rex_vistamp)Barid Rex Vistamp$(/l) in your inventory
